edu.iastate.ansci.flip

Class BinomialParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.BinomialParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BinomialParameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A utility class for modifying the binomial parameters of a ChromosomeInfo. A total of 4 different spinners can be created, maternal N and p, and paternal N and p. Where N spinners are integral and p spinners are real valued.
    Two modes of operation are allowed:
    Manual - N can be changed manually with p calculated
    Automatic - Both N and p are determined from the length of the chromosome
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isManual

        public boolean isManual()
        Indicates whether manual changing N is allowed
        Returns:
        true is the number of crossovers can be changed manually

      • setManual

        public void setManual(boolean b)
        Sets the value of ChromosomeInfo.manual. If true, allows manual changes of N to occur.
        Parameters:
        b - whether or not to allow manual changes
